QuestData.Title: The Storm Gathers
QuestData.Description: There is no time to waste, $n. Every moment we delay here gives the Sunreavers more of a hold on the Isle.$b$bLady Jaina Proudmoore awaits us. We should not make her wait any longer.$b$bSpeak to me when you are ready to depart. I will escort you there myself.
QuestData.LogDescription: Travel with Vereesa Windrunner to the Isle of Thunder.
QuestData.RewardText: You have arrived just in time, $n. This land needs to be controlled by the Kirin Tor for everyone's safety. This will not be an easy task.
